ParallelChunk.en: rapporteur. - (FR) Madam President, I think the oral amendment was sent to you in writing.
ParallelChunk.fr: rapporteure. - Madame la Présidente, l'amendement oral vous a été distribué par écrit, je crois.

ParallelChunk.en: Rather than saying 'the Council and the Member States', I propose that we say 'the Member States within the Council'.
ParallelChunk.fr: Plutôt que de citer "le Conseil et les États membres", je vous propose de dire "les États membres au sein du Conseil".

ParallelChunk.en: In English it would read, 'the Member States within the Council and the Commission', with deletion of 'and the Member States'.
ParallelChunk.fr: En anglais, ce serait: "the Member States within the Council and the Commission", avec la suppression de "and the Member States".

ParallelChunk.en: (FR) And I trust that the Group of the European People's Party (Christian Democrats) and European Democrats can accept it.
ParallelChunk.fr: Et j'espère que le groupe PPE peut l'accepter.

ParallelChunk.en: It is more consistent and more effective.
ParallelChunk.fr: C'est plus cohérent et plus efficace.
